li.xref: Add Managed Object(s) to a Collection from Search Results

section.title: Add Managed Object(s) to a Collection from Search Results
section.p:
Search for the required Managed Object(s). Select the object(s) from the table you want to save. Click the Add to a Collection button in the Action Bar. A panel is displayed on the right hand side of the screen. There are now two options available:
Add the Managed Object(s) to a new Collection
Add the Managed Object(s) to an existing Collection

fig.title: The Add to a Collection panel

section.p:
Detailed instructions on how to add a Managed Object(s) to a new or existing Collection from Search Results can be found in the
Add a Managed Object(s) to a Collection from Search Results tutorial.
